Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameEngine
public final class GameEngine extends Object
Central game management module. Serves as the link between entities with components containing data and systems specifying business logic.

    • update

      public void update(long dt)
      Proceeds the simulation by 1 tick. 
       All queued events are broadcast
 Each system updates all entities it is applicable to
      Parameters:
      dt - ns elapsed since last update
